ygData.subject: RE: Need more bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, sorry.  I ve heard the same thing, that Clarity didn t seem to stack with Call of Bones + Hymn.  I generally have other casters in the group for whom
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, sorry. I've heard the same thing, that Clarity didn't seem to "stack"
with Call of Bones + Hymn. I generally have other casters in the group for
whom I'm singing Clarity, therefore I was playing Hymn for her and Clarity
for the others. I was just saying that it would be easier on the bard to
just be singing Clarity. Bards need bathroom breaks too.

Crier


> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Monday, December 20, 1999 3:01 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Need more bards
>
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Mon, 20 Dec 1999, JasonF wrote:
> >
> > I've got a necro friend that turns into a pile of bones between
> fights with
> > Call of Bones. It's actually kind of annoying as I now have to
> sit at my
> > keyboard and weave Hymn and Clarity just for her. Whereas she
> can go afk or
> > watch TV or whatever. But. I don't complain to her. Much.
>
> Hmm, my necro friend said Clarity overwrote (canceled or
> didn't stack, I dunno) the mana regen benefit of being in
> skeletal form. He said to just keep Hymn playing. Since he
> was the only necro I regularly grouped with, I took his word
> for it and didn't press the matter.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
>
